mapper.insert: insert into ecs_order_goods (rec_id, order_id, goods_id, goods_name, goods_sn, product_id, goods_number, market_price, goods_price, split_money, send_number, is_real, extension_code, parent_id, is_gift, goods_attr_id, comment_state, shaidan_state, package_attr_id, is_back, cost_price, promote_price, goods_attr) values (#{recId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsSn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsNumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{splitMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sendNumber,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{isReal,jdbcType=BIT}, #{extensionCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isGift,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{goodsAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{shaidanState,jdbcType=BIT}, #{packageAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isBack,jdbcType=BIT}, #{costPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{promotePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsAttr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
